It was a huge pile of get-well cards!
With each card, Ruth felt renewed courage and hope.
In two weeks she was well, but she never forgot how much a card means.

Stephanie wanted a new couch.
She convinced her husband to go shopping for one with her.
They looked at several and couldn't agree on one.
They found a leather couch that reclines and both loved it.
Stephanie is so proud of her new couch.

Javier has always wanted to be more independent.
He decides to learn to drive to be less dependent on his parents.
He works very hard to learn how to drive and park.
Finally he is an expert driver.
Javier loves his newfound independence.

Ali was frozen where she stood.
Her sister had brought her with to a friends house.
The friend's sister was a bully who hated Ali.
Ali watched in shock as the bully approached her.
Before she knew what happened, they were in a full on fight.

Jake went to stay at his family's coastal cab for a week.
He went to rest one day on a rainy afternoon.
Jake woke up to a sudden shaking of his whole house.
He knew this would not be good, so he ran to higher ground.
Just as Jake got to the top of the hill, a massive tsunami came in.

Aaron came from a wealthy family, but he was curious about the ghetto.
He and his cousin Chuck drove into the city of Compton.
They turned into the drive-thru of the famous Tommy's Burgers.
At the check-out window they got their food and a gun in their faces.
Aaron gave up his Suburban truck and went walking for a pay phone.

Nancy and her boyfriend were fighting.
She used to write him notes.
She mentioned he wasn't romantic in the fight.
He went to his room and got all the notes he had collected.
She was touched he had kept them.

Yesterday I made some good hot chocolate.
The hot chocolate was delicious.
I made it with white chocolate.
I also put whipped cream on it.
It was the best ever.

Sylvie had been saving for four long years.
She finally had enough to comfortably buy her dream car.
At the dealership, the salesman convinced her to upgrade even more.
Once Sylvie left with her new car, she realized she overspent.
Luckily Sylvie got a raise the next day and could now afford it.

Mikey and his friends went to the lake.
They went onto a boat and prepared to ride a tube.
When the boat was moving, people began to climb onto the tube.
After the boat sped up, the inner tube popped and everyone flew off.
Mikey and his friends swam back to the boat and felt sad.

Leo was eating cereal in his room, even though it wasn't allowed.
He heard his parents coming to his room.
He quickly threw the bowl behind a shelf.
Later when they were gone he went to retrieve the bowl.
Milk had spilled everywhere and he had a huge mess to clean.

One time, in high school, I went roller skating with my friends.
It was the first time I had ever been roller skating.
After an hour or so, I got to the point I could stay on my feet!
That is, until I accidentally ran into a poor little girl.
Thankfully she was okay and forgave me for my poor skating ability!

A man wanted to lose fat.
He decided to use the air conditioner sparingly.
He felt this raise his metabolism.
He sweat a lot and reduced his bodyfat.
He found sweating often to help his reach his weight loss goals.

Wanda's daughter wanted a special doll for Christmas.
Wanda couldn't find the doll in any of the stores.
After checking the internet, she was able to find it.
Wanda decided to buy it.
Wanda's daughter was ecstatic when she opened the gift.

Tom was frugal.
He wanted to reduce his expenses.
He decided to cancel his cable TV service.
He called the company.
He cancelled the service.

Allie was having a party at her new salon.
She invited all her closest friends except Dawn.
When Dawn found out she wasn't invited, she was furious.
Dawn decided to not be friends with her anymore.
Allie was sad and apologized to Dawn but it was no use.

Jason had a bad dream.
He woke up suddenly was scared.
He couldn't go back to sleep.
Jason decided to get up and watch TV.
Eventually he fell asleep again in front of the TV.

A man went for a jog on a hot day.
He stopped at a deli to evade the heat.
The deli owner told the jogger he looked hot.
The jogger just grunted and nodded.
The deli owner filled a large cup of water for the thirsty man.

My brother's cat likes to leave the apartment.
One day my brother went to work.
He came home and found the cat in the hall.
She had sneaked out when he opened the door.
The cat was hungry and went home eagerly.

Nick loved to drive very fast on the roads near his home.
One evening he was driving in foggy weather.
A deer jumped out in front of his car.
Nick hit the deer with his car.
From that day forward, Nick decided not to drive so fast.

Ben wanted to grill some Meat.
He put on some dogs and burgers.
Then he had a few beers.
Suddenly he remembered to check the meat!
It was too late - everything had burned.

John rode the bus to work each day.
On one of these rides, the bus seemed to picked up a lot of speed.
The driver had had a heart attack and his foot was on the pedal.
John rushed down and pulled the driver out.
He stopped the bus just before it went in the river.

Sam was washing the dishes.
Suddenly, he noticed a puddle on the floor.
He tried to find the source of the water.
Then, he realized it was a leaking pipe.
Using a tool, he was able to fix it.

JoAnne was at the bus stop on Valentine's Day.
She was surprised she didn't get flowers at work.
She was wondering if her husband forgot about the holiday.
A car pulled up right before the bus came.
The driver was her husband with a bouquet of flowers.

Jake didn't drink much.
He went out to the bar with friends.
His friends were taking shots.
Jake thought it looked like fun and joined in.
He wound up throwing up shortly after.

Connie always loved her grandmother's biscuits.
She had them often growing up.
She remembers always wanting to know how to make them.
Her grandmother finally showed her how.
Now she never visits anymore.

Shawn was on a tour of a cheese factory.
He followed the guide through the factory.
Then, he tried some cheese samples.
After that, he took some funny pictures.
Finally, he left with a gift from the gift shop.

Rob likes comedy.
He wants to be a stand up comedian.
One day, he went to an open-mic night.
He ended up getting called on stage.
Now Rob is sure he will succeed at stand up comedy.

Lilly is scared in the dark.
She can not sleep in the dark without her nightlight.
At night she noticed that her nightlight was broken.
She was scared and quickly crawled into her parents bed.
Lilly felt comfortable in her parents bed and wasn't scared anymore.

Kaya was running around outside.
She stubbed her toe on the sidewalk.
It hurt badly!
Kaya cried and ran for her mom.
Her mom bandaged the bloody toe.

We went to a tequila bar while on vacation.
They had over 400 kinds there.
I got a margarita with dinner.
My wife got a tequila sunrise.
We both loved it and would go back.

Alex needed to go to school.
She hated taking the yellow bus with all the little kids.
She knew it would take almost an hour to walk to school.
She put on her walking shoes and headed out.
The walk to school took her 55 minutes.

Cindy has 5 children.
They seem to always forget to brush their teeth.
Cindy smelled their breath one day.
She brushed their teeth for them.
They now remember to brush their own teeth twice a day.

Frustrated by his life, the man sat on the couch and watched TV.
He was mostly chanel surfing because nothing held his interest.
He kept thinking about how much he hated his life.
On one channel He saw images of starving and dying children.
He realized his life wasn't THAT bad and felt a bit better.

Laura wanted to lose some weight.
She ran a mile every day.
She also dieted by reducing her caloric intake.
She lost 20 pounds over the course of 6 months.
Laura was proud of her accomplishments.

Alice liked candy a lot.
But it would get her really hyper.
One day after Easter she ate all her candy.
But she crashed the same day mid-afternoon.
Her parents keep an eye on her candy intake now.

Tom moved into a new apartment.
He liked that it had a pool on the top floor.
He loved that it was a salt water pool.
He swam laps there daily.
He quickly became an adept swimmer.

Toby was having dinner.
His mom had given him chicken and vegetables.
He tried to eat, but didn't like it much.
His mom told him that he would have to eat or go to bed.
Toby really didn't want to eat, so he went to his bed.

I played tetherball one time with my brother.
It was a lot of fun swatting the ball back and forth.
But it got a bit too competitive.
On one of his hits, the ball struck me in my face.
Man did that hurt and it taught me a lesson to be careful.

The car approached the intersection to turn right.
A pedestrian started walking across the adjacent street.
The driver honked his horn.
The walker did not hear the sound.
The car and the driver met in an unpleasant crash.

Several nuns tried to close down a strip club.
The nuns filed their case in court.
A hearing for both the nuns and club owners was held.
Court witnesses shook their heads in disbelief.
The judge threw their case out.

Tim was playing.
He got a cut on his finger.
He started crying.
There was a lot of blood.
However when his mom gave him a band-aid, the bleeding stopped.

Barry drove to a national park to climb a mountain.
He walked out of his car with his supplies.
Barry climbed to the base of the mountain and began to climb.
After a long climb, he made it to the top and took a picture.
Barry climbed back down from the mountain and went home.

A man's house is robbed.
The victim calls the police when he discovered what happened.
The police station sends a detective to the scene.
While driving, the detective sees an escaped prisoner.
He arrests the prisoner who also turned out to be the robber.

Jill finds out that Jan's boyfriend is married.
She tells Jan her boyfriend is married but Jan doesn't believe her.
So she brings Jan to meet her boyfriend's wife.
Jan is devastated by the truth.
But she thanks Jan for having the courage to tell her.

After a lot of discussion we decided to leave for vacation early.
Getting on the plane, we settled in for a long ride.
It took three hours.
Once we landed, we were in Costa Rica!
The weather was beautiful and we were happy to make it.

I took my girlfriend out to a new plaza that recently opened up.
We walked around several of the outlet stores.
She pointed to a shoe store.
We went in to check out the deals.
When we left, I treated her to some dinner before we left.

Cory wanted to be The Flash for a costume party.
He went to a costume shop to rent a costume.
The costume was too big, but he rented it anyway.
Cory showed up to the party in his ill-fitting costume.
No one at the party seemed to notice or care.

It was Terry's day off from work.
Terry did not want to spend all day at home.
Terry called his friend Mike to hang out.
Terry and Mike decided to go out for Coffee at a diner.
After paying his bill Terry went back home.

Lucy wasn't allowed to go into the street, or the alley.
Lucy's friend Lisa wanted to show her something cool in the alley.
Lucy knew she shouldn't go, but wanted to be cool.
As they walked down the alley Lucy's grandpa pulled up.
Lucy was forced to go sit in her room for the rest of the day.

Rebecca was new in town.
She went out to the bar to meet people.
The first three people she tried to become friends with shunned her.
The fourth invited her to an after party.
She went to it and got a bunch of numbers to call.

Sasha decided she wanted to adopt a dog.
She went to the humane society.
She looked at lots of dogs and puppies.
She played with a golden retriever puppy for two hours.
She adopted it and took it home that night.

Michael has beautiful hair.
He needs money due to losing his job.
Unfortunately, nobody will give Michael a job.
Michael decides to cut his hair and sell it.
He sells his hair to a wig maker and is able to pay his bills.

Greg's eighteenth birthday was coming up.
He couldn't wait to be considered an adult.
Things would be so much easier for him.
His parents told him he had to start paying for his own car insurance.
Putting a damper on his birthday, Greg had a good time anyways.

My internet browser was terrible.
I decided to download a new browser.
I did some research on browsers.
I found one that I liked.
I downloaded it and it was perfect.

Grandma loved her gravy.
She would make it all the time.
During the holidays she would put extra care into it.
But this year she ran out of a special ingredient.
Nobody liked her gravy this year.

Lonnie needed to refill his medication.
He called the pharmacy and told them he needed a refill.
Then, he got into his car and drove there.
He picked up his medication with ease.
It was a good thing he remembered.

Aaron was a stunt rider at a carnival.
He jumped into a metal ball with other motorcyclists.
They drove in circles around each other upside down.
Once Aaron hit the other motorcyclist and broke his jaw.
Now he is more careful but will never quit doing what he loves.

Gina returned to her desk from the bathroom.
She saw her friends Mary, and Rita talking to each other.
They stopped and looked at Gina.
Gina knew they had been talking about her.
And she knew Rita had told Mary what she promised to keep secret.

Susan had run out of allergy medication.
Susan asked her husband to pick up her prescription.
He drove by the pharmacy on his way home from work.
The line at the drive through window was 6 cars long.
He decided to go back later.

Not a peanut butter sandwich again!
John stared at his sack lunch dismally.
Then he had an idea!
He traded his orange for another kid's banana and honey packet.
Now he had a delicious peanut butter, banana, and honey sandwich!

Mark played basketball all the time.
He tried out for his school team.
He showed the coach his 3 pointer skills.
And his amazing dribbling ability.
Mark made the team as captain.

Joe is moving to the United Kingdom.
He's going there for graduate school.
His family has had a tough time saying goodbye.
Joe's mother almost burst into tears yesterday.
But his family is very proud of him.

Lily's dog was constantly escaping from her yard.
Lily searched the fenceline to see where the dog was getting out.
After a while, Lily found a small hole in the chain link.
Lily asked her father to repair the fence.
The dog never got loose from the yard again.

Marissa had been trying to eat healthy for a few weeks.
She decided one day to splurge on a soda.
She was taking a sip and it was disgusting to her.
The soda was grossly sweet and she spit it out.
She realized that eating healthy had turned her off of sugars.

No relief: How I Solved My Money Crisis
I needed to make some quick holiday money.
I wanted the cash to buy Christmas gifts.
I became an online seller of things I no longer wanted.
I made a good profit from the items I sold.
I bought some good presents for all my family members.

The fish I caught the other day were perfect sized.
I filleted half and scaled the others.
The whole ones are great but have a lot of bones.
Half the fun of eating bluegill is picking bones out.
My kids disagreed and ate all the fillets.

I was a homeowner but now I am a renter.
I applied for a loan because my homeowner's taxes were due.
The Credit Union rejected my application for the tax loan.
I begged the Payday Loan people to help me but they did not.
Now I am a renter because I was evicted from my home.

John came home exhausted.
Since he was in his bed for a while, his parents was concerned.
They constantly took his temperature and begged him to go to the nurse
Since he knew that his condition was temporary, he remained quiet.
Eventually, he started to feel better.

Max was about to run at a track meet.
Suddenly, he realized that his good luck charm was missing.
He frantically searched for it.
Luckily, his mom found it on the car floor.
Max grabbed it and then ran really well in his event.

Ken won a million dollars in the lottery.
He was so happy!
He paid off all his debts.
Then he bought a nice home and a new car.
Ken knew he could relax now for the rest of his life.

Joe thought it looked like a great day to play golf.
The sun was out and the temperature was perfect.
He decided to leave work early and go play.
As he was halfway through his game, a thunderstorm came.
He had to seek shelter fast.

Preston wanted to buy a house closer to his parents.
He found a job near them but still needed to find a house.
He talked to his Realtor friend and they started looking.
Ater he found the house he move closer to his parents.
His parents were so happy he moved closer.

The cheerleaders had been wearing their uniforms to school every year.
This year they were outlawed.
Cheer uniforms were no longer in compliance with the dress code.
The only time they could be worn was for pep rallies.
Cheerleaders had to wear a tshirt with jeans for game days.

Kelly had applied to Harvard a couple months ago.
She now was waiting for the admissions decision.
She prayed every night before bed that she would get in.
Yesterday she got the letter in the mail and opened it.
She was accepted and Kelly felt elated.

Ron was running with the basketball.
He performed a cross-over on Gary and made a lay-up.
Gary got up from the floor in a furious manner.
He pushed Ron.
The referee called a flagrant foul on Gary and he was ejected.

A man pulled the handle on the slot machine.
The reels came to a stop.
The machine lit up and made a lot of noise.
Coins began to drop from the machine.
The man jumped for joy.

A man was on the street telling jokes for money.
He told a lady a joke about a lawyer and she laughed.
He told a man a joke about an elephant and he laughed.
He began to earn a lot of money for these jokes.
The joke telling man laughed at his good fortune.

Chris was at a horror movie theater.
And he was glad to be sitting in the first row.
One scene really scared him.
And he wished he could sit even closer.
Chris had a great time.

Jacob was a young, eager treasure hunter.
His recent expedition was to try and find the Lost Jewel of Egypt.
He discovered the pyramid rumoured to contain the treasure.
With his secret map he scoured the tombs and found the jewel.
Although it was dangerous, Jacob was happy with his job.

Angel wanted to go to church.
She had no transportation.
She knew it would take an hour to walk to the church if she walked.
She put on her walking shoes and started walking.
She arrived five minutes before the service began.

Charles was seventeen years old and living in a new community.
He made friends with teenagers in his area.
But they were into graffiti and gangs.
One evening Charles went out with them and they did a robbery.
They were caught and Charles learned jail is torture through boredom.

Bob just got out from the rain.
Tired and wet, he removed his boots.
His feet were soaking wet and cold.
He looked to see what was the matter with his boots.
He stepped on a nail on his trek home from school.

Amy liked watching videos on Youtube.
She had learned about a challenge to post videos every day.
She decided to go for it.
At first, she was having a really hard time keeping up.
Luckily she was able to do it and she really loved it.

Mary had an essay that was due in 12 hours.
She delayed writing what she initially wanted.
She knew her ideas were not good enough and kept thinking.
Four hours passed of brainstorming and debating.
With little time left, Mary wrote about her initial ideas.

Bobby just came home from work.
He decided to cook himself some dinner.
He made himself a big steak with some potatoes.
While he was eating dinner, his dog snatched the steak from his plate.
Bobby had to order pizza because his dog stole his dinner.

Sean had a guitar.
He wanted to write a song.
He jammed a bit.
Then, some ideas came to him.
He wrote them down until he had a song.

Last year my tooth started to bother me.
My hygienist said the tooth looked ok.
The dentist took an x-ray and said it was an abscess.
He said a root canal would not help.
I had the tooth pulled in March.

I really love to eat pork chops.
My wife was not a very good cook.
The pork chops turned out pink and raw.
We were very hungry so we ate them.
We got very sick and never ate pork again.

Tyler was starting kindergarten.
He wanted to impress his teacher by tying his shoes.
He studied his mother's method.
Then he practiced a lot on his own.
On the first day of school, he could tie his own shoes!

Ben's grandma gave him a Christmas gift.
He unwrapped the gift.
The gift was an ugly sweater.

He gave it to his dog to use as a blanket.

Shelby was looking forward to her school's winter break.
First, though, she had to complete all of her final tests.
Break would start as soon as every test was completed.
Shelby worked hard and took all of her exams early.
Shelby earned herself an extra two days of winter break.

Snow fell on my sidewalk overnight.
I had to wake up early to shovel it all.
My neighbor saw me and walked over.
He told me that it would be nice if I did his sidewalk too.
I laughed in his face and went back to shoveling.

Sarah and Jean were driving home from a far away amusement park.
Sarah asked Jean if she wanted to stop and get something to eat.
The innocent question swirled around in Jean's overly careful mind.
Jean hesitantly decided that they should stay on the freeway.
Later, they rear-ended a slow driver who wrongly cut into their lane.

Amy was failing math.
Her parents hired a tutor to help her.
At first Amy resented the implication.
But the tutor studied with her and helped her quite a bit.
Soon Amy's grades had improved drastically!

Lisa was getting mad at her dad.
Her dad would not stop talking.
He was saying private things in front of everyone.
Lisa decided to not speak to him.
She was too upset.

Jill had a gambling problem.
She had spent her savings on lottery tickets.
She thought she would be able to pay off her credit card if she won.
Jill lost all her money through the lottery tickets.
Jill got treatment for her gambling problem the next day.

My friends and I were drunk at Denny's one night.
We decided to have a pancake eating competition.

We all stuffed ourselves and threw up.
Nobody won that night.

Trevor fell very ill during finals week at college.
He emailed all his professors telling them he was sick.
All of his professors said that he could take his finals later.
A week later, Trevor felt better.
He took his finals and aced them all.

No relief: Molly goes to the dog park
Molly was a puppy
She was so full of energy
She loved to play outside and go the dog park
One day her owner brought her to the dog park
She was so excited to play with all the other dogs

Bob bought a new suit.
The suit was very expensive.
Bob bought a coffee.
Bob spilled his coffee on his suit!
It ruined Bob's suit and his day.

Joe owned a dairy farm.
One day the fence in his pasture broke.
He found the cows all on the other side, eating tall green grass.
He called his neighbor and apologize.
But the neighbor thanked him, it saved him the trouble of mowing.

I took Bowser out in the woods for a walk.
He likes eat bugs and chase animals in the woods.
Bowser also likes to be ahead of you on the walk.
This gets him tired out real quick.
On the way back Bowser is exhausted and ready to nap.

Jeff became the at a new company and started this week.
This company was full of people who fought with each other a lot.
Jeff took a conflict resolution seminar last year.
He applied what he learned at the seminar to his new employees.
Soon everyone was getting along and working together just fine!

Marley and June have been meeting secretly for years.
Recently a coworker saw them in a nearby town.
Word began to spread across town.
Their spouses eventually filed for divorce.
Marley and June married the following spring.

Mandy was driving too fast on an icy road.
He skidded off the corner of a curve.
Because of how fast he was going, he hit a tree very hard.
Mandy was thrown through his windshield from the force.
Mandy's seat belt still contained some of his body afterwards.

Matt has been at his job for over 30 years.
He loves what he does and likes going to work.
He has some really great co-workers.
He has a long list of accomplishments over the years.
Matt decides he has earned his way to retirement.

Gina had a new bra.
She wore an off the shoulder shirt to show it off.
A boy named Dave snapped her bra strap hard, and ran away.
The strap struck her skin with force.
Gina cried out in pain, and ran after the boy.

Jimmy decided to play a prank on his teacher.
He put a thumbtack on her chair when she wasn't looking.
Soon he heard a scream, and saw that she was in pain.
Jimmy hadn't realized his prank might really hurt her!
Jimmy decided not to play any more pranks after that.

Ella was making pasta for her family's dinner.
Her husband told her the pasta noodles were too soft.
The next time, Ella remembered his comment.
She removed the noodles from the flame much earlier.
Her husband said they were perfectly al dente this time!

Jill is working on a spreadsheet.
Jill is having some problems with the document.
Jill reaches out to her new co-worker Bill.
Bill is able to help Jill fix the issue.
Jill is excited to have made a connection with Bill.

Jon took Melissa on a special date.
He did not tell her where.
He whisked her off into a limo.
When she got in her mom was also there.
They went to her favorite concert.

I lived in Kansas for my entire life.
I had never seen an ocean.
I decided to take a road trip to Malibu beach.
Finally, I saw an ocean in real life!
It was nothing spectacular.

Jenny has been single for Years.
She wants a boyfriend but she has very high standards.
Finally a cute boy asks Jenna out on a date.
They eat dinner at a romantic restaurant.
Jenny thinks this date might be the end of her single life.

I woke up one very early weekend morning.
I put on my clothes and left my house.
It was dark still when I arrived at the pond.
I sat on my boat for hours waiting for a bite.
Finally, I went home after catching several fish.

Jim and Tim had a bet to see who could memorize more digits of pi.
One week later they met up and each could recite exactly 100 digits.
For a tie breaker, they each guessed at the 101st digit.
Tim guessed wrong and Jim guessed correctly.
Jim won the best and Tim had to pay him $31 and 45 cents.

Today, I made lunch to bring to school with me.
I made a sandwich with roast beef, pickles, and cheese.
I also put a bag of chips in my lunch.
I took it to school and had it at lunch time.
I was really glad I had made myself lunch.

Lucy called her friend Amy the day after a party she missed.
Amy had gone to the mall with other friends.
Lucy was far away and feeling left out.
It upset her her friends were having fun while she was bored.
Amy decided not to call them till she was home again.

Bob and Bill were snowball fighting.
Bob kept throwing snowballs too hard.
One of the snowballs hit Bill right in the face.

The boys ran inside to clean him up.

Sue's friends called her Silly Sue because she was so funny and cute.
Sue's mom worried that Sue wouldn't get a job being funny, though.
Then Sue got an audition at a comedy club.
The patrons loved her, and Sue was hired immediately!
Sue's mom was so happy, she almost cried!

There was a dad and son.
The dad wanted to teach his son to shave.
He taught him to be careful
He taught him to get a close shave.
The boy remembers this forever.

I woke up and got out of bed.
I dragged a comb across my head.
I went downstairs and drank a cup.
I looked up and noticed I was late.
I ran to the bus and just made it.

One day in class my teacher taught something interesting.
He taught us that the laws of physics were absolute.

After the lesson we had a pop quiz.
A question about that statement was on there and I got it right.

I wrote a note in class.

However, my teacher noticed me.

The entire class was laughing.

Caitlyn loved to paint wildlife scenery.
Although her skills were impressive, the paintings went unnoticed.
One day, she met a professional painter and showed her the paintings.
The painter was impressed and decided to display them in a gallery.
After receiving this exposure, Caitlyn became a renowned painter.

I loved eating fruit.
I never bothered washing it.
One day I ate a peach and fell sick.
There were pesticides on the peach.
I realized I should always wash my fruit.

Several posters were posted on the bulletin board in the hallway.
It says that the senior prom is within the next week.

I thought of one friend and approached her.
After asking her out to the prom, she said yes.

Jeff had to give a speech at his job next month.
It was going to be in front of the entire company.
Jeff was nervous because he gets stage fright.
He took a crash course of public speaking which helped him a lot.
By the time the day came to give the speech Jeff was confident!

Alissa was babysitting some children on a Saturday.
They were feeling very bored.
Alissa decided to take them to the zoo for entertainment.
They went and the children had a great time.
Alissa was glad she was able to give them a fun day.

Jon decided to eat some Korean food.

He ordered fried fish with kimchi.
He thought it was delicious!

I was helping Leidy with her science fair project tonight.
After she turned it in, she thanked me for all her help.
A week later, I called her to arrange another meet-up.
She didn't' respond until next month.
The message says that she had to walk her dog and couldn't come.

Jenny wanted to be a model.
Jenny was not the prettiest woman, though.
She worked out everyday.
She got plastic surgery.
She became a model.

Wendy love mexican food.

Red and green sauces, sour cream, and cheese were on every dish.

Tyler bought a new stamp with his name on it.

A mouse was running through a kitchen.

Greg has always loved seeing different animals.

At the end of the day Greg returns home.

Irving found a toy that he could not live without.

He decided he would work hard and save his money for it.

In the end, he deposited his money instead of spending it.

Ellen desperately wanted to be on TV.
She read that a game show was interviewing contestants at the Mall.
She drove over, and interviewed.
A few weeks later, she got a call: she would be a contestant!
It was her dream come true!

It was Ariana's first day of school and picture day.

As soon as she sat in the chair to get it taken, she tensed up.
She hated picture day.
However thankfully the pictures came out good.

Betty was looking forward to the school prom
She went dress shopping with her mother.
They picked out a beautiful dress together.
She wore it to her prom.
Her date told her she looked beautiful and she blushed.

Lindsay was getting up in the morning, today was special.
It was her wedding day, she woke up to all of her brides maids.
They had laid out her dress, and got her favorite breakfast.
Drinking her orange juice, she heard a loud bang and screamed.

Eric spent his mornings watching scuba diving videos.
He decided he wanted to learn how to scuba dive.
Eric signed up for a local scuba diving course.
He spent the next few weeks learning different procedures.
Eric passed his scuba diving test!

Cindy was getting her kids ready for pictures.
She thought her daughter would look good in shoulder pads.
Her daughter strongly disagrees.

Her daughter frowned in all the photos.

Ryan was rich growing up.
He had almost everything.
After a series of events Ryan lost all of his money.

Olive was looking forward to getting to know her college roommate.
When she met Nancy, she got a bit of a shock - Nancy was blind.
Olive didn't know anything about living with a blind person.

One day I was walking down an alleyway.
I saw a cardboard box that I look inside.

He is my new best friend.

Tiffany bought a rice cooker to make healthy food.

Tanya parted the ferns, and looked between them.

Jake's cat was stuck in the tree.

Jake fell off the ladder and fell down.
His cat climbed down the tree by herself.
Jake's cat went to lick him afterwards.

Ali's sister Amy was going to her friend May's house.
Ali's mom made her go with Amy.
Amy told Ali her friend Mary had a sister the same age as Ali.

Upon arrival Ali was horrified to see the sister was the bully Val.

Lisa and her friends decided it would be fun to pick oranges.
They arrived at the grove early.
The girls brought along with them buckets for the fruit.

When they were done they picked about a hundred oranges.

It was finals week.
All of the college students were stressed.
Tom has a prescription for ritalin.
He started selling some.
He made a lot of money.

Davidson was moving toward the hoop.
As soon as he went for lay-up, his ankle bent.
He rushed on the floor to break the fall.
A group of medics had to escort him to the locker room.

Larry and his girlfriend go into an argument over money.
Larry ended up pushing his girlfriend.
The girlfriend called the police.
The police came and arrested Larry for domestic violence.

Seth is tired of walking to work every day.
He wants to buy a car but they are too expensive.
Finally Seth decides to buy a bike.
He loves getting to work on his brand new bike.
Seth is very happy he no longer has to walk to work.

Charlie wanted a new bike badly.
He saved his money in a small, glass, piggy bank.
He saved until his piggy was full of change.
When he finally had enough, he didn't want to break his little piggy.
Charlie decided that he loved the little piggy more than a new bike.

The boy had good grades.
He always studied for test and quizzes.
One day he forgot to study.
He failed the biggest test of the year.
The test brought his grades down and made him fail the class.

Neil was visiting Hungary.
He was having a great time!

As a child I hated drinking white milk.
As I grew into adulthood I always wanted to drink it.

One day I poured coffee creamer in a cup of milk and it tasted yummy.
Now when I want milk I just add some creamer to it.

Harry was on a cruise ship for vacation.

All of a sudden a strong wind blew him off the edge of the boat.
The coast guard was nearby to rescue him with their boat.

Last week my friends and I went to a trampoline park.
As soon as we got there, I ran for the nearest trampoline.
I started bouncing and having fun.
Yet unfortunately my knees became all rough from falling.
My body ached for another week after.

Henry is trying to launch a startup.
He wants to start an independent videogame developer.
However, he has no programming experience.
Henry recruited some of his friends in computer science to help.
We still have yet to see how it will pan out.

Paul was the best basketball player on his high school team.
But if his team was losing, he assumed someone else was at fault.
One game, the referee accused Paul of foul play.
Paul attacked the referee.
Paul was never allowed to play on his school team again/

Kim and Dave went out on a date.
They went to a popular restaurant.
They tried to have a good time but it was too loud.
They could barely talk to each other.
They decided to leave early to walk at a park instead.

Dakota finished his job at a summer camp.
He had really enjoyed working with children.
He realized he might want to work with children as a profession.
When he returned to college he visited a career counselor.
Dakota switched his major to Elementary Education.

Joan heard stories about the new girl at school.
When the new girl invited her over, Joan felt nervous and excited.
Joan was even more nervous to find the girl's parents weren't home.
Then, the new girl got out a box of paper dolls to play.

I was back squatting in the gym.
For some reason, it was hurting my back.

Our apartment has an odor somewhere.

Instead of looking more we just gave up.

Allie and Tom were playing in the snow.

He got a ball of snow and ran up to Allie.

Bob decided to cheat on his exam.

Adam tried out for the football team his junior year.
He didn't make the team because he couldn't catch the ball.

He practiced all winter, catching ball after ball.
He tried out the next year and was the star of the team.

Jay forgot his insulin shot before he went to work.
while he was at work he began to feel funny.
Then he remembered that he forgot to take his shot.
He had his friend drive him home so he could take his shot.
Jay got his shot and everything turned out alright.

Tim loved The Price is Right.
He was surprised when get tickets to the show.
He was even more surprised when he got called on stage.
He didn't win anything other than a consolation prize.

Sandy was an excellent swimmer.
One day Sandy's brother fell in the pool.

Alex was on a camping trip with his family.

Throughout his trip, he completed activities and earned his badge.

Kyle bought 2 dozen eggs at the supermarket.

After two weeks he remembered the eggs.
Kyle needed to cook the eggs before they went bad.
For his next five meals he ate scrambled eggs.

Jake was eating a burger from his local fast food restaurant.

Thomas wanted to take a walk to the store.

My husband and I took Sam and Kelton bowling.

Two brother cats were adopted together.

Kelly used to enjoy driving.
She had a job where she had to drive around the country.

Long distance driving was a lot of fun until the accident.
Kelly's car was totaled and now she doesn't drive anymore.

Tim noticed a slightly burning smell.

Thomas is fairly introverted so Maria invited him to a party.

Ike was trying to write poems.

Tami had tried out for volleyball at her local high school.

Ayla started to learn to cook at a young age.

Jane was at the roller rink with her friends.

Isabella loves to play with her older sister.

Isabella his way back in the closet.

Ryan had studied hard for the test.

Bob got detention.

Danielle's puppy was very sick.

I reached the front of my school.

My daughter is Isolde.

I have a cat named Madrigal

The quarterback tried to reached the goal.

Mandy had not purchased herself a toothbrush in Years.

I saw her at the checkout line.

The snow fell for almost two whole days.
When it was over, I sent the boys outside to shovel your driveway.

The boys and my neighbor came inside for some hot cocoa that I'd made

Jenny loved visiting her grandparents.

Victoria always took too long to do her hair.

Julian ran away from home one day.

Bob's roommate Jim was a smoker.

Ben took his son to his first baseball game.

Carl took a shower before he left for work.

My sister is amazing!
For my birthday she got me tickets to my favorite band.

Angie loved makeup.

Kiley wanted to earn extra money to help pay for her vacation.

Nicole was excited that Mike asked her to the prom.

Dennis bought his girlfriend a watch for her birthday.

Joe hated washing dishes.

One day I went on a strange 2 week diet.

Gina had been at her grandma's house for over a week.

The class was playing Heads up Seven up.

Mike's girlfriend went to buy everyone beer.

My daughter had As in high school.

None of Kendra's kids, nor did she, wanted to do the dishes.

Sierra has been taking ballet lessons since she was four.

I looked at the windows in my house.

Vince just got hired as a college dean at a nice school.
He's excited because he has worked very hard to get this job.

Oliver was very annoyed by the next door neighbor's barking dog.

Bill went to a nightclub.
It was his first time.

All of a sudden his favorite song came on.
Bill danced randomly, not caring about how he looked.

Jane was a stay at home mother.

Samantha had 5 voicemails on her phone when she woke up.

Samantha told her ex-boyfriend she did not want to talk to him.

Jen is a neat freak.

Jen realizes she needs to scale it back a bit.

Riley wanted to do her hair.
She found a style online.
Then, she watched the tutorial.

Ted was an art student at college.
He was tasked with creating a project for his class.

Cora was on the beach.

Emily had bloodwork done two weeks ago.
Today, the doctor called her and said she needed more tests.

Connor arrived at the park for his very first soccer game.

In the last minute of the game, Connor got the ball and scored!

Lucy and her husband went on a trip to France.

The two of them went to stay at a fancy hotel.
They saw all the landmarks.
However to their surprise, Lucy got pregnant.

Taylor wanted to be a hockey player.
Even though he tried really hard, she was not very good at the sport.

Now Taylor is the best hockey player on the team.

My uncle took me fishing once.

Amy wasn't getting enough hours at work.

Bob was woodworking.
He needed to cut up a plank of wood.

Julia was having a lot of financial trouble.

Gemma was about to leave on a trip.

Lilly had practiced all summer hoping to make the cheer team.

She felt like she had done well at tryouts.
When the squad list came out she was thrilled to see her name on it!

Kelly wanted a dog.

Kate was visiting Paris and she had already seen the Louvre museum.

She decided to go to the Musee d'Orsay to see the Impressionist works.
When she arrived, she gaped in open mouthed awe and wonder.

Mark and Mandy didn't like their new neighbors.
Mark and Mandy could hear them make love every night.
Mark was tired of it and knocked on their door.
Mark said, could you guys keep it down at night?

Susan was a great artist.

They were experiencing a drought.

Suddenly a man from outside comes in.
He started giving out water for free.
Everyone was happy for the time being/

Amy was on the school bus headed home.

Eunice lived her whole life without tasting cheese.

Greg moved from the city to a farm.

Gabby had a lizard and her name was Lulu.

Tim hated dogs.

A thunderstorm started outside.

Julie's hair was getting very long.

Sam was getting ready for his bowling match that night.

Nicolas Cage used to be a well respected actor.

Irregardless, many believe he tarnished his reputation.

Charlie went to the golf course with his dad.

Billy and Jean were swimming in the inflatable pool.

Ty had a crush on Lynn for a long time.

Lana's music class was planning a field trip to Ireland.

The owners of a local restaurant were caught stealing servers' tips.

Nita was headed to a party across town.

Willard's condition catches up to him.
He collapses and is hospitalized.
As he lays in the hospital bed, he does some deep soul searching.

After Ike was arrested, the office slapped handcuffs on him.

The officers had to carry Ike into the police car.

I never wanted to move houses.

I am very glad we moved houses.

Kathryn and her husband wanted something fun to do with the family.

The whole family had a wonderful evening.

Bob lived in his house for thirty years.
His fence was deteriorating and broken in many places.
He decided to get a new fence.
He hired a team of workers to make a metal fence.
The project went great and Bob finally had a new fence!

Bob decided to visit his parents for Christmas.

His parents were angry and made him pay for the plate.

Henry was eating lunch in the cafeteria.

Oscar and his wife had money problems.

They were able to get everything on the right track.

Sara wanted to make her community more eco-friendly.
She started a recycling program.
There, she taught people how to recycle various types of items.
Soon her neighbors were recycling almost everything they could!
Sara felt very good about her environmental impact.

Tim needed help moving.

Michael Slick was on a mission to be a ghetto superstar.
He wanted to sell products in the underground and do legit deals.
He started selling guns from his house and shopping music demos.
His artist signed a record deal and Michael's share was a million.
But he was arrested for selling guns a month after his big payday.

Tom had his clothes on backwards.

He even wore his shoes backwards.
One day he was running and fell really hard.
He never wore anything backwards again.

Clark had always been impressed by tap dancers.
He decided he wanted to learn to tap dance too.
He started taking a tap dance class after work.
He practiced very hard until he was a great tap dancer.
Clark was proud that he was not a tap dancer.

Tommy was the class clown.
It was silent in class one day.
Tommy stood up and every looked at him.

Everyone in the class laughed at the funny joke.

Rob checked in to his hotel in Houston.
After he entered his room, he began unpacking his belongings.
It was then that Rob realized he had forgotten his toothbrush.
He went to the front desk to ask for assistance.

Janet was complaining to Jerry about her cheating boyfriend.

The next day, Jerry arrived to school.
He saw Janet walking around campus.

Last night I read my book under a lamp.
The light flickered and the bulb went out.

I replaced the dead bulb for a new one.

A mighty oak tree had a long branch that was above a house.

Now the branch was cracked and barely attached.

I was installing my new router.
Alas, my ethernet cable was too old.
The new router couldn't support the old ethernet cable.

Finally, the new cable worked perfectly with the new router!

Megan decided to make dinner.
She cooked tacos for Taco Tuesday.

Louisa had to go to the dentist.
She had to get a cavity filled.

Sally was on a date.

She threw up later that evening.

Jan had just gotten a boyfriend.
She decided to straighten her curly hair to impress him.
She spent hours combing out all her curls.
But then her boyfriend told her the curls were prettier!
Jan was relieved that she could keep her natural curls after all.

Dan went to the back of the classroom to grab his jacket.
Another boy walked over and hit him in the face.
Dan hit the boy back and the boys began to fight.
The teacher ran over and broke up the fight.

Kane bought his lottery ticket that week just like always.
He always played the same numbers, his lucky numbers he called them.
The week of the drawing came and he paid attention with half interest.
He vaguely heard a few of his numbers being called.
He did a double take at his ticket, he had won the jackpot!

Bill house sits for his rich friend.
He lies to girls by telling him the house and fancy cars are his.
He starts dating a model.
When she finds out that he's not rich she dumps him.

Nick and Nina met by a duck pond one night.
They sat together and talked for hours.
While they chatted, they drank orange soda and ate snacks.
As it got late, they laid down and looked at the stars.
Eventually, they fell asleep together in the grass.

May awoke and went to the kitchen.
There was a chicken bone and crumbs on the table.

Jill detested her mother's cooking.
Growing up she took every opportunity to miss dinner.
She played on sports teams and joined every club at her school.
She even asked her boss for dinner time shifts.
Her mother never figured out Jill's real motives.

Jennifer thought Max was very cute.
She was too shy to ask him out.
Finally Max asked Jennifer out for a date.
She was very excited.
Jennifer and Max had a romantic night out.

Courtney and Katie are dating.
They have been dating for two Year's now.
Kadie decides to propose to Courtney.
Courtney says she will marry Kadie.
They are both filled with joy.

Jack and Sam decided to race their new cars.
They found a quiet street and took off.
As Jack rounded a corner he lost control.
He smashed into a tree.
His brand new car was totaled.

Lina had a boyfriend in jail.

One day, she met a handsome fellow at the store.
He swept her off her feet, and she fell in love.
Lina made the decision to leave her jail man for this new guy.

Mia and her friends had a big exam coming up.
They decided to get together to study for it.

When the test came, they all did very well.
They vowed to study together every time they had an exam after that!

Gina tripped on her shoe.
She was carrying a Tupperware full of her jewelry.
And now her jewelry was all over the floor.

Pierre was a really tall guy
He worked in a place full of short people
His manager was having trouble getting a shoe at a top shelf
He reached over and got the shoe for her
She promoted him to supervisor

One day, it was raining very hard.
James overheard his grandpa say that it was raining cats and dogs.

Finally,his grandpa told him that that just meant it was raining hard.

Last night I had several strange dreams.
My dog Gus passed away about two weeks ago.
He appeared in every one of my dreams.
I hugged him one last time.
This morning I woke up crying because I miss him dearly.

Ned had never visited a farm before.
He stared open mouthed at the huge cow.

But he worked up his nerve and reached out a hand to pet it.
When the friendly cow licked his hand, And laughed.

Ian was given a weekly allowance of $5.
Every week he bought candy at the student store at his school.
He would eat the candy but didn't like to brush his teeth.
One day his teeth hurt and his parents took him to the dentist.
He had 2 teeth taken out because of cavities.

Amy hadn't answered any of Kim's calls.
So Kim went over Amy's house.

Tom decided he needed to quit smoking for good.

Today I took my son for his first haircut.

Rod was out walking one day.

The winter season in Kansas wasn't usually too bad.

My baby brother was playing with a toy.

Beatrice was watching the news for the weather one day.

The teacher failed Patrick for copying work from his worksheet.

Missy was at a doctor's appointment.

Jennifer's mother was trying to teach her to drive.

My son's third birthday was today

Laura decided to host a tea party for her stuffed animals.

My family put up our Christmas tree Thanksgiving night.

Linda was tired of telemarketing jobs.

Juan is seeking entrance into the United States.

Jared was on a camping trip with his friends.

May was waiting on her granddaughter Lucy to get dressed.

Trish was running for class president.

I wanted to go to my friend's house.

I have friends coming over for dinner tonight, so I need to get ready.

Mary and Joe have been together for Years.

Tim had big plans for his day off.

Sarah married Joseph but they couldn't afford a home.

There was a rainstorm last night.
When j went downstairs to the car, there was ice all over.

Sleep still eluded Marsha.

Every summer, folks in Sarah's town compete in a chili contest.

A hockey player was skating towards the opponent's goal.

Brian, a young boy, was given a gift card to a sporting goods store.

Ava saw a large bee in her apartment.

I was eating a Popsicle this afternoon.

Larry wanted to give his daughter a special toy.

Ken bought a motorcycle.

Bob was left home alone by his parents.

When everyone came to the party, we played musical chairs.

Chloe's boyfriend took her to a horse racing track for fun.

Sam and Janice were going to a party.

Kate did not know what to make her kids for dinner.

Caleb has spent many Years in Boston but never visited the Aquarium.

There was a family of groundhogs living in our yard.

I submitted my short story into a school literary magazine.

Josh loves to run and decided to run a marathon.

The day of the race arrived and Josh was nervous, but felt prepared.

Rick had a drug problem.

He sat there waiting for his turn to say his problem.

Tanya had a very misbehaved puppy.
She took it to obedience class to learn to behave better.

When the class was over, the puppy received an award for improving.

Suzy is going to painting class today.

Tom was a Tea enthusiast.

Jill meets Bob online.

When he picks her up he looks like he's at least 25.
They go snooping in her PC and they find out that he's 30!

Brandon thought he found something special when he found fake Pot.

Ora wanted a kitty for Hanukkah.

Joe likes to go to Minnesota to his grandparent's cabin on the lake.
Every summer Joe takes his family there to go fishing.

Kim was on vacation in the Bahamas with friends.

Marcus went to his school's football game.

I decided to eat some poached eggs.

Tom decided to spend the night in a cave.

Don was watching TV one night.

Sid called his friends and organized a paint party.

Missy wanted puppies to sell.

Paul hopped out of his car and locked the door.

Mary had to work on her thesis.

Billy was always playing video games on his phone.

One day when he playing and walking he fell.

John wanted to go to the movies.

One day, I went to a cafe and ordered a sandwich.

Juanita decided that she needed a computer to write her letters on.

Jessie called her mother.

Tammy recently got engaged and was excited to go dress shopping.

Ron loved playing sports.

Jennifer had always loved flying in planes.

The big football game was coming up soon.
