After days of begging, they finally said yes.
Jude gave his sickness to the other campers.

Kate was doing chat hits with other workers on Mturk.
She was apprehensive initially.
She worried the other person wouldn't be fair.
After 3 hits she realized she liked them.
She Was happy to discover they were good hits after all.

No relief: A Teenage Boy Turns His Life Around
Donna's son kept getting into trouble and was suspended from school.
He eventually had to spend a month in juvenile detention.
That month made a huge change in her son's attitude.
He graduated from high school on time and found a full-time job.
Donna is very relieved at the turnaround her son has made.

Fred had always wanted to ride a horse.
He was afraid he might fall off of it thought.
One day he decided to give it a try.
He loved riding a horse.
Fred was glad he had finally tried riding a horse.

Victoria was talking to a man she met on the internet.
They went out on several dates.
She thought they had a nice time together.
She began to worry when he stopped responding to her text messages.
Victoria, although upset, gave up on the idea of that relationship.

Julie baked a cake for a friend's birthday.
She drove the cake over to her friends house.
The cake tipped over in her car.
She threw a blanket over the mess.
She visited her friend without any cake.

Hank was offered a cooking show for a new cable network.
He wanted to make a good impression, so he worked hard on his recipes.
He perfected a few things.
Then he practiced his delivery.
The first day of filming went great!

Angela ordered a new dress.
She waited patiently for the delivery man to bring it.
Finally, it was dropped on her doorstep.
She ripped open the package and tried it on.
It was perfect!

The hungry cat searched outside for food.
He found some scraps of meat on the ground.
He ate the meat.
His stomach started to feel bad.
He found a bush to hide under and be sick.

The racers were lined up ready to go.
All of the racers had their eyes locked on the flag man.
He waved his flag and the racers were off like a shot.
On and on they sped, winding up and down the hills.
At the finish line it was neck and neck, a photo finish.

No relief: Amelia meets Mickey and Minnie Mouse.
It was Amelia and her family's last day on vacation in Disney.
Amelia's parents had one last surprise for Amelia.
After waiting in line for just a short while, it was Amelia's turn.
Amelia's face lit up when she went through the doorway and saw them.
It was Mickey and Minnie, smiling and reaching out to her!

It was too hot outside to do anything.
The friends decided just to watch tv.
They wanted a lot of silly made for tv movies.
Then they watched the news.
They had wasted the whole day on the couch.

Tom and Mary uses the same clock.
Mary also turned the clock hand so that it was five minutes fast.
Tom also turned the clock hand so that it was five minutes fast.
Tom and Mary went to a meeting.
They were both ten minutes early for the meeting.

My aunt hosted a small get together and invited the family.
I decided to go there with my mom.
However, we arrived around night time.
Unfortunately, my aunt told us that the food was finished.
Since I was starving, I decided to leave early in order to buy food.

Mary got a new job.
She was not even looking for one.
Someone had recommended her for the position.
She was very surprised.
She accepted the job immediately.

Brad was bullied during school for his new glasses.
The bullies took his glasses off him and broke them.
Brad went home to cry and thought about getting revenge.
The next day Brad decided to embarrass his bully in revenge.
Brad had shown the whole school his embarrassing baby pictures.

Karen decided to shop for duck decoys at an antique store.
Her boyfriend, Aaron, loves to go duck hunting.
He also decorates his home with antiques.
Karen was pleased with the selection and bought two decoys.
Aaron was excited to receive his birthday present from Karen.

The kids invented a game.
It was a race to see who could clean their rooms the fastest.
THey both got sidetracked and forgot to keep cleaning.
Their mom liked the game, however.
It kept them quiet and got their rooms clean!

My girlfriend drug me to the opera with her.
I did my best to follow what was happening.
Despite my efforts I was bored and fell asleep.
My snoring was so loud it annoyed the whole row.
An usher shook me awake and politely asked me to leave.

During class, the professor reviewed the material fast.

Since I sat in the front, the teacher immediately noticed.
He tried waking me up.
I received a small warning in order to remain awake.

Linda is driving down the road.
She hears a loud noise.
She pulls over and checks the hood.
It's the engine it's blown.
She calls Triple A and waits for help.

The neighborhood had a block party last year.
Everyone was in attendance.
They all got to know each other and made new connections.
The kids all played together.

Tim wanted to join the school's marching band.

The band leader told Tim he had just the spot for him.

Scott pushed a girl from behind.

Scott was given counseling for his behavior.

A rabbit hopped into the yard.

They left a bowl full of vegetables for the rabbit to snack on.
The next day, they vegetables were all gone!

I had to turn in a progress report at work.
I was nervous that my report wouldn't be as good as my co-workers'.
When a co-worker left her desk, I sneaked a glance at her report.
My report was much better than hers!
I felt much better about turning in my report.

Josie was a new Girl Scout.
She was determined to sell a lot of cookies this year!
She went door to door and made a lot of sales.
At the end of the month, she was recognized as the troop's top seller!

Mike decided to grow an evil mustache.

Mike achieved his goal of growing his facial hair the way he wanted.

Barry was anxious to attend his upcoming reunion.
Barry was invited to give a speech about his favorite teacher.
Barry has been practicing his speech for over two months.
As the day arrived, Barry was ready to give his speech.

Pam asked Gordon where the electric box for the house was.

The seller finally returned Gordon's call and told him where it was.
